verses.verse: <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H3900>feast<s%> to a <S%H506>thousand<s%> of his <S%H7261>lords,<s%> and <S%H8355>drank<s%> <S%H2562>wine<s%> <S%H6903>before<s%> the <S%H506>thousand.<s%>

<S%H1113>Belshazzar,<s%> whiles he <S%H2942>tasted<s%> the <S%H2562>wine,<s%> <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H858>bring<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> his <S%H2>father<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had <S%H5312>taken<s%> out of the <S%H1965>temple<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> was in <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> that the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and his <S%H7261>princes,<s%> his <S%H7695>wives,<s%> and his <S%H3904>concubines,<s%> might <S%H8355>drink<s%> therein.

<S%H116>Then<s%> they <S%H858>brought<s%> the <S%H1722>golden<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%> that were <S%H5312>taken<s%> out of the <S%H1965>temple<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> was at <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and his <S%H7261>princes,<s%> his <S%H7695>wives,<s%> and his <S%H3904>concubines,<s%> <S%H8355>drank<s%> in them.

They <S%H8355>drank<s%> <S%H2562>wine,<s%> and <S%H7624>praised<s%> the <S%H426>gods<s%> of <S%H1722>gold,<s%> and of <S%H3702>silver,<s%> of <S%H5174>brass,<s%> of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> of <S%H636>wood,<s%> and of <S%H69>stone.<s%>

In the same <S%H8160>hour<s%> <S%H5312>came<s%> <S%H5312>forth<s%> <S%H677>fingers<s%> of a <S%H606>man's<s%> <S%H3028>hand,<s%> and <S%H3790>wrote<s%> <S%H6903>over<s%> <S%H6903>against<s%> the <S%H5043>candlestick<s%> on the <S%H1528>plaster<s%> of the <S%H3797>wall<s%> of the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H1965>palace:<s%> and the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H2370>saw<s%> the <S%H6447>part<s%> of the <S%H3028>hand<s%> that <S%H3790>wrote.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H2122>countenance<s%> was <S%H8133>changed,<s%> and his <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> him, so that the <S%H7001>joints<s%> of his <S%H2783>loins<s%> were <S%H8271>loosed,<s%> and his <S%H755>knees<s%> <S%H5368>smote<s%> <S%H1668>one<s%> against <S%H1668>another.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7123>cried<s%> <S%H2429>aloud<s%> to <S%H5924>bring<s%> in the <S%H826>astrologers,<s%> the <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> and the <S%H1505>soothsayers.<s%> And the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spoke,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H3605>Whoever<s%> shall <S%H7123>read<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3792>writing,<s%> and <S%H2324>show<s%> me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, shall be <S%H3848>clothed<s%> with <S%H711>scarlet,<s%> and have a <S%H2002>chain<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%> <S%H5922>about<s%> his <S%H6676>neck,<s%> and shall be the <S%H8523>third<s%> <S%H7981>ruler<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H5954>came<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H2445>wise<s%> men: but they <S%H3546>could<s%> not <S%H7123>read<s%> the <S%H3792>writing,<s%> nor make <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof.

<S%H116>Then<s%> was <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> <S%H7690>greatly<s%> <S%H927>troubled,<s%> and his <S%H2122>countenance<s%> was <S%H8133>changed<s%> in him, and his <S%H7261>lords<s%> were <S%H7672>astonished.<s%>

Now the <S%H4433>queen<s%> by <S%H6903>reason<s%> of the <S%H4406>words<s%> of the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H7261>lords<s%> <S%H5954>came<s%> into the <S%H4961>banquet<s%> <S%H1005>house:<s%> and the <S%H4433>queen<s%> <S%H6032>spoke<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H2418>live<s%> for <S%H5957>ever:<s%> let not your <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H927>trouble<s%> you, <S%H408>nor<s%> let your <S%H2122>countenance<s%> be <S%H8133>changed:<s%>

There is a <S%H1400>man<s%> in your <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> in <S%H1768>whom<s%> is the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods;<s%> and in the <S%H3118>days<s%> of your <S%H2>father<s%> <S%H5094>light<s%> and <S%H7924>understanding<s%> and <S%H2452>wisdom,<s%> like the <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> of the <S%H426>gods,<s%> was <S%H7912>found<s%> in him; whom the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> your <S%H2>father,<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> I say, your <S%H2>father,<s%> made <S%H7229>master<s%> of the <S%H2749>magicians,<s%> <S%H826>astrologers,<s%> <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> and <S%H1505>soothsayers;<s%>

For as <S%H3606>much<s%> as an <S%H3493>excellent<s%> <S%H7308>spirit,<s%> and <S%H998>knowledge,<s%> and <S%H7924>understanding,<s%> <S%H6591>interpreting<s%> of <S%H2493>dreams,<s%> and <S%H263>showing<s%> of <S%H280>hard<s%> <S%H280>sentences,<s%> and <S%H8271>dissolving<s%> of <S%H7001>doubts,<s%> were <S%H7912>found<s%> in the same <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> <S%H1768>whom<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H8036>named<s%> <S%H1096>Belteshazzar:<s%> <S%H3705>now<s%> let <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> be <S%H7123>called,<s%> and he will <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> was <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H5954>brought<s%> in <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king.<s%> And the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spoke<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> Are you that <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> are of the <S%H1123>children<s%> of the <S%H1547>captivity<s%> of <S%H3061>Judah,<s%> <S%H1768>whom<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> my <S%H2>father<s%> <S%H858>brought<s%> out of <S%H3061>Jewry?<s%>

I have even <S%H8086>heard<s%> of you, that the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H426>gods<s%> is in you, and that <S%H5094>light<s%> and <S%H7924>understanding<s%> and <S%H3493>excellent<s%> <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> is <S%H7912>found<s%> in you.

And <S%H3705>now<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men, the <S%H826>astrologers,<s%> have been <S%H5954>brought<s%> in <S%H6925>before<s%> me, that they should <S%H7123>read<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3792>writing,<s%> and make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof: but they <S%H3546>could<s%> not <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H4406>thing:<s%>

And I have <S%H8086>heard<s%> of you, that you <S%H3202>can<s%> make <S%H6591>interpretations,<s%> and <S%H8271>dissolve<s%> <S%H7001>doubts:<s%> <S%H3705>now<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> you <S%H3202>can<s%> <S%H7123>read<s%> the <S%H3792>writing,<s%> and make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, you shall be <S%H3848>clothed<s%> with <S%H711>scarlet,<s%> and have a <S%H2002>chain<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%> <S%H5922>about<s%> your <S%H6676>neck,<s%> and shall be the <S%H8531>third<s%> <S%H7981>ruler<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> Let your <S%H4978>gifts<s%> be to yourself, and <S%H3052>give<s%> your <S%H5023>rewards<s%> to <S%H321>another;<s%> <S%H1297>yet<s%> I will <S%H7123>read<s%> the <S%H3792>writing<s%> to the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and make <S%H3046>known<s%> to him the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

O you <S%H4430>king,<s%> the <S%H5943>most<s%> <S%H5943>high<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H3052>gave<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> your <S%H2>father<s%> a <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H7238>majesty,<s%> and <S%H3367>glory,<s%> and <S%H1923>honor:<s%>

And for the <S%H7238>majesty<s%> that he <S%H3052>gave<s%> him, <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H5972>people,<s%> <S%H524>nations,<s%> and <S%H3961>languages,<s%> <S%H2112>trembled<s%> and <S%H1763>feared<s%> <S%H4481>before<s%> <S%H6925><s%> him: <S%H1768>whom<s%> he <S%H6634>would<s%> he <S%H6992>slew;<s%> and <S%H1768>whom<s%> he <S%H6634>would<s%> he kept <S%H2418>alive;<s%> and <S%H1768>whom<s%> he <S%H6634>would<s%> he <S%H7313>set<s%> up; and whom he <S%H6634>would<s%> he <S%H8214>put<s%> <S%H8214>down.<s%>

But <S%H1768>when<s%> his <S%H3825>heart<s%> was <S%H7313>lifted<s%> up, and his <S%H7307>mind<s%> <S%H8631>hardened<s%> in <S%H2103>pride,<s%> he was <S%H5182>deposed<s%> from his <S%H4437>kingly<s%> <S%H3764>throne,<s%> and they <S%H5709>took<s%> his <S%H3367>glory<s%> from him:

And he was <S%H2957>driven<s%> from the <S%H1123>sons<s%> of <S%H606>men;<s%> and his <S%H3825>heart<s%> was <S%H7737>made<s%> <S%H5974>like<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts,<s%> and his <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> was with the <S%H6167>wild<s%> <S%H6167>asses:<s%> they <S%H2939>fed<s%> him with <S%H6211>grass<s%> like <S%H8450>oxen,<s%> and his <S%H1655>body<s%> was <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven;<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H3046>knew<s%> that the <S%H5943>most<s%> <S%H5943>high<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H7990>ruled<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men,<s%> and that he <S%H6966>appoints<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> it <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> <S%H1768><s%> he <S%H6634>will.<s%>
And you his <S%H1247>son,<s%> O <S%H1113>Belshazzar,<s%> have not <S%H8214>humbled<s%> your <S%H3825>heart,<s%> <S%H3606>though<s%> you <S%H3046>knew<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H1836>this;<s%>

But have <S%H7313>lifted<s%> up yourself <S%H5922>against<s%> the <S%H4756>Lord<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven;<s%> and they have <S%H858>brought<s%> the <S%H3984>vessels<s%> of his <S%H1005>house<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> you, and you, and your <S%H7261>lords,<s%> your <S%H7695>wives,<s%> and your <S%H3904>concubines,<s%> have <S%H8355>drunk<s%> <S%H2562>wine<s%> in them; and you have <S%H7624>praised<s%> the <S%H426>gods<s%> of <S%H3702>silver,<s%> and <S%H1722>gold,<s%> of <S%H5174>brass,<s%> <S%H6523>iron,<s%> <S%H636>wood,<s%> and <S%H69>stone,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H2370>see<s%> not, <S%H3809>nor<s%> <S%H8086>hear,<s%> <S%H3809>nor<s%> <S%H3046>know:<s%> and the <S%H426>God<s%> in <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H3028>hand<s%> your <S%H5396>breath<s%> is, and whose are <S%H3606>all<s%> your <S%H735>ways,<s%> have you not <S%H1922>glorified:<s%>
<S%H116>Then<s%> was the <S%H6447>part<s%> of the <S%H3028>hand<s%> <S%H7972>sent<s%> from him; and <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3792>writing<s%> was <S%H7560>written.<s%>
And <S%H1836>this<s%> is the <S%H3792>writing<s%> that was <S%H7560>written,<s%> <S%H4484>MENE,<s%> <S%H4484>MENE,<s%> <S%H8625>TEKEL,<s%> <S%H6537>UPHARSIN.<s%>
<S%H1836>This<s%> is the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H4406>thing:<s%> <S%H4484>MENE;<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> has <S%H4483>numbered<s%> your <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H8000>finished<s%> it.
<S%H8625>TEKEL;<s%> You are <S%H8625>weighed<s%> in the <S%H3977>balances,<s%> and are <S%H7912>found<s%> <S%H2627>wanting.<s%>
<S%H6537>PERES;<s%> Your <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is <S%H6537>divided,<s%> and <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H4076>Medes<s%> and <S%H6540>Persians.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H560>commanded<s%> <S%H1113>Belshazzar,<s%> and they <S%H3848>clothed<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> with <S%H711>scarlet,<s%> and put a <S%H2002>chain<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%> <S%H5922>about<s%> his <S%H6676>neck,<s%> and made a <S%H3745>proclamation<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> him, that he should be the <S%H8531>third<s%> <S%H7990>ruler<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom.<s%>
In that <S%H3916>night<s%> was <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> of the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H6992>slain.<s%>
And <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4077>Median<s%> <S%H6902>took<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> being about three <S%H8361>score<s%> and <S%H8648>two<s%> <S%H8140>years<s%> <S%H1247>old.<s%>
